com.douglasjose.tech.csv
Interface CsvParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomDelimitersCsvParser
public interface CsvParser

The CsvParser class contains the functionality required to persist the Csv data structure. Implementations of this interface are expected to be components of implementations of the Csv interface, isolating the persistence logic from any other implementation. As there is no standard defining how a CSV file should be, this inteface allows a Csv data structure to be persisted in different formats.

Author:
Douglas Rodrigues
